title: Firefox doesn't work with my VPN?
content: There are other threads about this, but the solutions given haven't worked for me. I'm using Mullvad VPN, and whenever it's on, I cannot search for anything regardless of my search engine, and pretty much the only website that will open is Tumblr. For anything else, the URL will be in the bar at the top, but it won't do anything beyond that; it won't even show the loading symbol. It worked very briefly when I first got the VPN, but now it doesn't. Other browsers work with my VPN. What am I supposed to do?
creator: kl4ush4rgr33v3s

title: Please advise how to change the Firefox icon in the Windows task bar
content:
... if this is even possible?

Has there been an influx of blue as the preferred icon color the latest years?

With somewhat degraded eyes, this has started to become a problem for me.

I want to have Firefox Developer edition installed, but I have to settle for the standard edition. Why ? Because the standard edition has a distinct orange icon. I am not able to quick glance at the task bar and see the difference between what window is Firefox Dev (blue icon), Outlook (blue icon), VSCode (blue icon), Azure Data Studio (blue icon), WebStorm (blue icon), 1Password (blue icon) or MS Edge (blue icon).

My problem is that my web browser (in this case Firefox) is the application I most often switch back and forth between and the struggle is real... I have to spend a lot of time looking at the task bar to acuatlly be able to see what icon is Firefox Developer Edition.

I don't need this as a feature in Firefox, necessarily, just some tips or tricks if there is any icons in the program folder e.g. I can swap out.
creator: oskaremil

title: Updating firefox has become too complicated
content:
I really appreciate everything you do, but I am a boomer (Loud and Proud), I did not get born with a device attached to my hand, I am a digital imbecile.

With all that in mind, it has become too difficult to keep up with the digitalisation, at least in my case. So when you send me suggestions and update procedures I end up just closing everything, too much to read, too stressing, but the suggestions keep coming every time I open the firefox browser. Can I not just keep the version I have and decline any new versions.

I also have a problem in regard to language, it is set to English, but I do not care for US English, I would like to have GB English, but somehow it won't accept that.

What can I do?

Kind regards,

Xamama
creator: xamama

title: La riproduzione dei video di YouTube è sempre "muta"
content: La riproduzione dei video di YouTube è sempre "muta". Gli stessi video che sono privi dell'audio in Firefox vengono, invece, riprodotti fedelmente usando Opera. Il mio Firefix è aggiornato al massimo delle possibilità (127) ed il mio OS è Windows 11

title: Extension - Create - Use - Upload
content:
Hello,

I've recently uploaded a custom-made extension to the Chrome Web Store for my personal use and for a few specific users. It's currently awaiting review.

However, I'm encountering an issue where I cannot download and use the extension myself. When attempting to download, I receive the message "Download failed. Please check your connection."

Although I can see the extension listed on the store (since it's mine), I'm unable to use it personally.

Could you please assist me with resolving this issue?

Thank you.

title: Não consigo deletar textos apertando Delete
content:
Bom dia, Boa tarde, Boa Noite.

Prezados, venho aqui por meio deste comunicar que o Facebook no Mozilla Firefox funciona de forma errática quanto a suas caixas de texto.

Seja em comentários, seja em conversas pelo Messenger, o resultado de selecionar tudo com CTRL + A e depois apertar Delete ou Backspace não apaga todo o conteudo, somente a primeira linha, tendo de repetir o processo vez após vez.

Mesmo utilizando o modo de correção de problemas (antigo modo seguro) ou limpando o cache, o problema não é resolvido. Desativando a aceleração por Hardware também não se provou frutífera de bons resultados: o problema permaneceu.

Como devo proceder neste caso? Fico no aguardo de uma resposta.

Grato.
creator: alexedicoes

title: Saving bookmarks from same website overwriting previous bookmark
content:
Let's say I've bookmarked a job posting from Company Z, the job is zookeeper. Then later there is a job for a lion trainer that I want to bookmark from the same company, same website -- but it overwrites the zookeeper job and replaces it with the lion trainer job.

1) Why is it doing this? 2) How can I save BOTH bookmarks (and more) from the same website?

TIA
creator: MizzouMadeKC

title: Youtube not working in firefox
content:
Hi there! I've been having problems with youtube not working in firefox lately. It's ONLY in firefox that it does this issue in, I've tried it in other browsers. Youtube tends to just....stop buffering in firefox for some reason? My internet connection is not the issue so I'm not sure what I could do to mess with it, I've done a fresh install of firefox, I've cleared cache and cookies. I'm genuinely at a loss.

It takes FOREVER for it to actually s tart up in the video too. The video plays fine until it just...stops buffering and takes 5-10 minutes to load. As mentioned before this is only an issue in firefox.
creator: nizzknob
